diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BC$ is $72$ units.
The length of the line $AC$ is $z$ units.
The length of the line $BP$ is $8y$ units.
The length of the line $AP$ is $y$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $x$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
The line connecting $C$ and $P$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $P$ and $D$.
